name: An Apple a day (Grizzly Cogs)
description:
Charlie is a little pig who is starving for apples! Catch the apples depending on how she is hungry, catch all the coins, and complete all the days!

      

Controls :
- DOWN arrow : eat
- UP arrow : catch (coin)
- LEFT/RIGHT arrow : avoid

Original soundtrack :
Soundtrack is available for free here : https://grizzlygames.bandcamp.com/album/an-apple-a-day

      

Credits :- Boris Warembourg : GD, LD, dev, music, sounds, pixel art.
Made for Game Off 2022 Game Jam.
